channel.title: CVE Feed for pypa -- pypa/setuptools
channel.description: The latest CVEs for pypa -- pypa/setuptools

item.title: CVE-2024-6345|2024-07-15T00:00:14.545Z -- pypa -- pypa%2Fsetuptools
item.description: A vulnerability in the package_index module of pypa/setuptools versions up to 69.1.1 allows for remote code execution via its download functions. These functions, which are used to download packages from URLs provided by users or retrieved from package index servers, are susceptible to code injection. If these functions are exposed to user-controlled inputs, such as package URLs, they can execute arbitrary commands on the system. The issue is fixed in version 70.0.
